remarks: Value of the first projection on a morphism.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
statement:
1stfval.t $e |- T = ( C Xc. D ) $.
1stfval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` T ) $.
1stfval.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` T ) $.
1stfval.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
1stfval.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. Cat ) $.
1stfval.p $e |- P = ( C 1stF D ) $.
1stf1.p $e |- ( ph -> R e. B ) $.
1stf2.p $e |- ( ph -> S e. B ) $.
1stf2 $p |- ( ph -> ( R ( 2nd ` P ) S ) = ( 1st |` ( R H S ) ) ) $.
